Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire this item at a competitive rate, while still allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
